ComicInfo.Title: The Secret Diary of Bettie Page, Chapter Two: Queen of the Space Commies
ComicInfo.Summary:
Bettie takes on Hollywood as the B-Movie Queen of the Space Commies! Bettie gets in over her head with the shadowy Sky Science cult! Bettie unleashes chaos at the Griffith Park Observatory!
Writer David Avallone and artist Colton Worley are your tour guides through the thrilling second issue of The Secret Diary of Bettie Page!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Joseph Michael Linsner | 1 | B | Cover B | Scott Chantler | 2 | C | Color Photo Cover C | Photo | 3 | D/RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Variant Cover | Scott Chantler | 4 | E/RI | 1:20 Retailer Incentive "Virgin Art" Edition Variant Cover | Joseph Michael Linsner | 5 | F/RI | 1:30 Retailer Incentive "Virgin Art" Edition Variant Cover | Scott Chantler | 6 |
